abilities.description: Poisons the target, dealing 2 magical damage per second and slowing movement by 13% if the equipped hero is melee, or by 4% if they are ranged. Lasts for 2 seconds.

name: Orb of Venom
description: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.
trivia: Orb of Venom's lore Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper. is a reference to the quote of V for Vendetta. "Weapon" was intentionally written wrong, with a V, for the reference's sake.
